Tool

NameCreate Reference Points
ID0
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2013
Specificationinteractive

Description

Digitize reference points for georeferencing grids, images and shapes. Click with the mouse on known locations in the map window and add the reference coordinates. After choosing 4 or more points, stop the interactive module execution by unchecking it in the in the modules menu.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Output
Reference Points (Origin)Shapes (output)REF_SOURCE
Reference Points (Projection) (*)Shapes (optional output)REF_TARGET
Options
MethodChoiceMETHODAvailable Choices: [0] Automatic [1] Triangulation [2] Spline [3] Affine [4] 1st Order Polynomial [5] 2nd Order Polynomial [6] 3rd Order Polynomial [7] Polynomial, Order Default: 0
Polynomial OrderIntegerORDERMinimum: 1 Default: 3
Clear Reference PointsBooleanREFRESHDefault: 0
(*) optional
